name: ssh-gateway
title: SSH Gateway
description: SSH Gateway: Quickly connect to your servers using SSH. This extension allows you to manage and access multiple SSH connections easily and efficiently, improving your productivity and simplifying your daily tasks.
author: Pascual_Chavez

preferences.name: sshConfig
preferences.title: Select Config Source
preferences.description: Where should it look for the hosts config

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
